contentLists.heading: Which types of regulations do you follow when you start a Healthcare App Development?
contentLists.content:
We follow the below-listed security regulations and compliances when we start a Healthcare App Development:

For the USA

  • HIPAA (Health insurance portability and accountability act)
  • PHI (Protected health information)
  • HITECH (Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act)

For The European Union, UK & Canada

  • GDPR (The General Data Protection Regulation)
  • The Data Protection Law Enforcement Directive
  • DPA (The Data Protection Act)
  • Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act

contentLists.heading: Can you give me Examples of Healthcare Apps which trending?
contentLists.content:
In the market, we have numerous types of healthcare Apps. Some of them are:

  • Doctor On-Demand App
  • ePrescription App
  • Health & Wellness App
  • Electronic Health Record App
  • Medication Reminder App
  • Wearable Healthcare App
  • Symptoms Checker App
  • Medical Record App
  • Diet and Nutrition App
  • Fitness App

contentLists.heading: Types of Healthcare App & what features should a Healthcare App have?
contentLists.content:
There are 3 types of Healthcare apps:

  • Patient App
  • Doctor App
  • Healthcare Information App for Hospital

Healthcare App should have below listed features:

  • Easy registration and login
  • Patients get Appointment easily
  • The facility of Telemedicine & ePrescription
  • Maintain Patient’s Electronic Health Record
  • Tablet Reminder
  • Easily Integrate Wearable Devices
  • Easily Call to Ambulance
  • Nearest Hospital Map
  • InApp Chat Facility
  • Quickly Search & Consult Doctor
  • Video Conferencing
  • Health Dashboard of Patients
  • Symptoms Checker
  • The Patients can easily Pay

contentLists.heading: Can you list some of your developed Healthcare apps?
contentLists.content: In our 11+ year’s experience, we design and developed 150+ Apps. You can view all our App Development projects in our Portfolio section.

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership and the code of my Healthcare App?
contentLists.content: Yes, we will give you code ownership after the development of the Healthcare App project. However, in some cases, depending on the NDA terms, then we claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: What steps are followed for the healthcare app development process by your company?
contentLists.content:
Our healthcare app development process:

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation.
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming & Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my Healthcare App project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of the Healthcare App. We provide you build of a healthcare app in every sprint of the healthcare app. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for Healthcare App Development?
contentLists.content: We offer a fixed time/price model or a fixed dedicated resource model for your Healthcare App Development. You can choose a hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a Healthcare App?
contentLists.content: The development cost of a Healthcare App totally depends upon the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a Healthcare App, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop a Healthcare App?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your Healthcare App and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your Healthcare App development project. To precisely understand in detail please, you can email us your Healthcare App development requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.
